CustomField.description: The Developer Name of the Salesforce Named Credential record that stores the LLM provider's base API endpoint URL and handles authentication (e.g., inserting API keys).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Named Credential MUST be configured correctly with the LLM provider's base URL and appropriate authentication mechanism (e.g., Custom Header with API Key, OAuth 2.0).
CustomField.label: Named Credential
